text: Ani yahudi va khriscana mhanatata ki amhi allahace putra ani mitra ahota. Tumhi sanga ki maga allaha tumacya aparadhampayi tumhala siksa ka deto? Navhe, kimbahuna tumhi tyacya srsta nirmitita eka manava ahata. To jyala icchito, mapha karato ani jyala icchito siksa-yatana deto. Akasanci va jaminici ani yancya daramyanaci rajyasatta kevala allahacica ahe, ani tyacyacakade paratavayace ahe
